text: Tropidema chrysocephala is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Tropidema. It was described by Charles Coquerel in 1851.BioLib.cz - Tropidema chrysocephala. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1851 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Tropidema
